page.title: 13A German Girl's View
page.content: Anne is 16 years old.Her parents are doctors.She came to West Buckland School to learn English.She finds many differences between North Devon and Germany.The weather better in Germany.The humour is better in England.The attitude to school is not so serious and Anne likes this.The food is generally better in Germany.She certainly does not like school meals here.Chocolate and meat are very much nicer in her home town. Anne has been in England almost a year and likes boarding at West Buckland School and she has learnt alot about English life. Anne's hobbies are music,swimming,knitting,ballet,choir and skiing. R.C.W.Smith Mark Greenslade
